content:
# The stone furnace has been successfully placed at the coordinates (0.0, 0.0).
# However, the furnace is currently out of fuel and has no ingredients to smelt, as indicated by its status.

# I need to load the furnace with coal and iron ore so that it can start smelting the iron ore into iron plates.
# Let's add the coal and iron ore to the furnace.

load_fuel(furnace, 'coal', quantity=5)  # Load 5 units of coal into the furnace.
load_ingredients(furnace, 'iron-ore', quantity=10)  # Load 10 units of iron ore into the furnace.
print(f"Furnace status after loading: {furnace.status}")  # Check the status of the furnace after loading.
